content: if you need to keep a cold head warm or work up a quick gift for someone then this is the pattern for you this is a simple no frills sort of hat which can easily be dressed up by using a higher-end or nicely variegated yarn or a quick shell edging to make a slouch hat add more row after the increases all the stitches you need to know are single_crochet double_crochet and slip_stitch hat begins with a magic_ring easy enough for a beginner sizing note my head is 22 in circumference and this hat fits snugly but not at all tight hat should fit the average adult head the single_crochet band at the bottom provides greater insulation for chilly ears gauge note gauge is given in the pattern but really all you re doing here is working a flat circle until it hits 7 in diameter and then you stop increasing if you re not hitting my gauge just keep an eye on your diameter measurement **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours **
